data.title: Ladakh
data.description: Ladakh is bordered by the Tibet Autonomous Region to the east.

data.title: Manali
data.description: Manali is a town, near Kullu town in Kullu district in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh.It is situated in the northern end of the Kullu Valley

data.title: Gangtok
data.description: Gangtok is a city, municipality, the capital and the most populous city of the Indian state of Sikkim and also the headquarters of Gangtok District.

data.title: Darjeeling
data.description: Darjeeling is a town and municipality in the northernmost region of the Indian state of West Bengal.

data.title: Dalhousie
data.description: Dalhousie  (Hindustani pronunciation is a hill station, near town of Chamba in Chamba district in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh

data.title: Nainital
data.description: Nainital is located in the Kumaon foothills of the outer Himalayas at a distance of 285 km (177 mi) from the state capital Dehradun.
